name: Photo Copier
description:
Copy photos from your mobile to Figma seamlessly. Be it screenshots of apps, photos of your notes or snaps from your field study, the Photo Copier plugin can help you transfer photos to your Figma quickly.


Check documentation here


If you find any issue with the plugin, contact me at 001sanketkulkarni@gmail.com


Coming soon in upcoming releases:

  1. Ability to upload multiple images
  2. Get rid of verification code


If you have any improvement ideas, share them in the comments below.
